      • authenticate

        public java.lang.String authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            boolean isAdmin)
        Checks if user with specified username and password exists. Returns codes based on the result
        Parameters:
        username -
        password -
        isAdmin -
        Returns:
        0 if authenticated, 1 if user doesn't exist, 2 if user not active, 3 if passwords don't match, 4 if wrong platform
